description: Context information for the professional fees in the price estimate. Context information is used to define the expected circumstances of the charges such as provider and department. Professional fees are generated in Resolute Professional Billing.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the price estimate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider that is used to provide context for the price estimate's professional fees.  If no provider has been specified, a generic place-holder will be used (provider 1, provider 2, etc).

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The department that is used to provide context for the price estimate's professional fees.

columns.name: POS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The place of service (POS) type that is used to provide context for the price estimate's professional fees.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries:

columns.name: VISIT_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The visit type that is used to provide context for the price estimate's professional fees.

columns.name: SERVICE_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The benefit service type used to determine benefit information for the professional fees section.  This information comes from the benefit record attached to the estimate. Use the PR_EST_INFO table, BENEFITS_INFO_ID column to link this data.

columns.name: SERVICE_TYPE_ID_SERVICE_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of this benefit service type.

columns.name: PB_DENT_PROC_SUBSTATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Status explaining why a procedure is not scheduled. Also groups procedures in the estimates activity and on the letter.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PRICING_CONTRACT_ID
columns.description: This item holds the pricing contract used to calculate the price for all procedures in the estimate context.

columns.name: PRICING_CNTR_OVR_YN
columns.description:
This item stores whether a user has overridden the pricing contract that is stored in I PES 311. There are two values: 0) No - Contract has been selected by the system. 1) Yes - Contract has been chosen by the user. The default is No.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
